title: Detecting Arrhythmogenic Right Ventricular Cardiomyopathy From the Electrocardiogram Using Deep Learning
details: S Sigfstead, CJ George, R Jiang, B Davies… - JACC: Clinical …, 2025
abstract: Diagnosing arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy (ARVC) is challenging due to its variable clinical presentation, similarities with other cardiomyopathies, and the absence of a definitive test. 1, 2 Diagnosis relies on Task Force criteria, including …
